类 ReversiView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • ReversiView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ReversiView
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is implement the view of the game, it mainly use the javafx to complete the function and show the game board, it also show the step of player's move and computer's move also it show the important information
    作者:
    Wenkai Zheng

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 javafx.application.Application

        javafx.application.Application.Parameters

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 javafx.application.Application

        STYLESHEET_CASPIAN, STYLESHEET_MODENA

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReversiView()
      simply constructor of ReversiView

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void display()
      method name: display purpose: once the game is end, show the important message if human win, print "You Won" else print "You Lost"
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main function purpose: to lunch the javafx and the stage
      void remove_all()
      method name: remove_all purpose: remove all of the event handle we set in the pane
      void sendModel()
      method name: sendModel use the network to send the board information
      void set_handle()
      method name: set_handle purpose: set the 64 StackPane inside of title pane and each StackPane has a child called circle and each StackPane set a EventHandler of mouse, once it clicked, make the correspond move if human win, print "You Won" else print "You Lost"
      void set_pane()
      method name:set_pane purpose: after receive the board information from other side reset the pane show in the UI
      void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      method name: start purpose: the javafx stage and set the mainly use parameter and set each handle initialize most of function and parameter. also add a Handler which new the game, delete the saved data also when close the window, save the game data and when run it again, load the data and continue in project6, we add the Networked Reversi.
      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      method name: update purpose: Observe the change in the model, once it changed, show the change in the board

      • 从类继承的方法 javafx.application.Application

        getHostServices, getParameters, getUserAgentStylesheet, init, launch, launch, notifyPreloader, setUserAgentStylesheet, stop

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main function purpose: to lunch the javafx and the stage
        参数:
        args - form the input string

      • remove_all

        public void remove_all()
        method name: remove_all purpose: remove all of the event handle we set in the pane

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        method name: update purpose: Observe the change in the model, once it changed, show the change in the board
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
        参数:
        o - the Observable pass from the model
        arg - the information object

      • display

        public void display()
        method name: display purpose: once the game is end, show the important message if human win, print "You Won" else print "You Lost"

      • set_pane

        public void set_pane()
        method name:set_pane purpose: after receive the board information from other side reset the pane show in the UI

      • sendModel

        public void sendModel()
        method name: sendModel use the network to send the board information

      • set_handle

        public void set_handle()
        method name: set_handle purpose: set the 64 StackPane inside of title pane and each StackPane has a child called circle and each StackPane set a EventHandler of mouse, once it clicked, make the correspond move if human win, print "You Won" else print "You Lost"

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        method name: start purpose: the javafx stage and set the mainly use parameter and set each handle initialize most of function and parameter. also add a Handler which new the game, delete the saved data also when close the window, save the game data and when run it again, load the data and continue in project6, we add the Networked Reversi. inside the UI add a new menu item which can make one become the server Another become the client so they can play against each other server ro client could be both computer or human
        指定者:
        start 在类中 javafx.application.Application
